observationCategory.dldescription: Type of Observation recorded. Can be Block, Paddock, Feed or Grazing

observationDate.dldescription: Date (and depending on Observation, time) at which the Observation was made. For some events, the time component of the Observation is critical (for instance, a Milk Yield Observation). For others, (such as condition score), the rate of change is slow enough that time is irrelevant

observationItems.dldescription: Provides a reference to the observation items
